attributes.action: Scrap the Olympic Logo and ask the nation to design a new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone seem's to be agreeing that the newly designed London 2012 olympic logo looks terrible. Please sign this petition if you beleive it should be scraped and let the nation design and vote for a new one.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
